bug.short_desc: Fix broken links in API documentation

long_desc.thetext: The documentation for the parameter format of qx.util.format.DateFormat.ctor contains a broken link to qx.util.format.DateFormat#DEFAULT_DATE_TIME__format The documentation for qx.util.format.DateFormat.getDateInstance contains a broken link to qx.util.format.DateFormat#DEFAULT_DATE__format The documentation for qx.util.format.DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance contains a broken link to qx.util.format.DateFormat#DEFAULT_DATE_TIME__format The documentation for qx.ui.virtual.selection.ISelectionDelegate.isItemSelectable contains a broken link to qx.ui.virtual.selection.Cell! Daniel, assigned to you, so you'll be in charge of correctly addressing (maybe mostly dispatching) the issues for 1.0.
The link checker reports no more broken links for r21228.

We should make sure any broken links in the API docs are fixed as one of the final tasks before each release is published (perhaps just before the code freeze, or after verifying the fixes for issues found in manual testing).

List of broken links for master (a02eb0ea):
- The method documentation for qx.io.request.AbstractRequest#_getParsedResponse contains a broken link to qx.io.request._onReadyStateChange - The method documentation for qx.bom.element.Transform#rotate contains a broken link to qx.bom.element.Transform#tarnsform - The method documentation for qx.bom.element.Transform#scale contains a broken link to qx.bom.element.Transform#tarnsform - The method documentation for qx.bom.element.Transform#skew contains a broken link to qx.bom.element.Transform#tarnsform - The method documentation for qx.bom.element.Transform#translate contains a broken link to qx.bom.element.Transform#tarnsform - The class documentation for qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.AbstractRenderer contains a broken link to qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.addButton - The class documentation for qx.core.Environment contains a broken link to qx.bom.client.CssTransfrom#get3D - The event documentation for qx.io.request.Xhr#readyStateChange contains a broken link to qx.bom.request.Xhr#readyState - The class documentation for qx.data.controller.website.List contains a broken link to qx.bom.Tempalate - The class documentation for qx.data.store.Json contains a broken link to qx.data.store.Json#setDeprecatedTransport - The method documentation for qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue#_onChangeContent contains a broken link to qx.ui.mobile.form.Input#changeValue - The method documentation for qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue#_onInput contains a broken link to qx.ui.mobile.form.Input#input - The method documentation for qx.io.request.Jsonp#_getParsedResponse contains a broken link to qx.bom.request.Jsonp#responseJson

Fixed the obvious typos. Tino, please fix the ui.mobile.* docs:
- The class documentation for qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.AbstractRenderer contains a broken link to qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.addButton - The method documentation for qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue#_onChangeContent contains a broken link to qx.ui.mobile.form.Input#changeValue - The method documentation for qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue#_onInput contains a broken link to qx.ui.mobile.form.Input#input
Then assign this issue to Tristan for the rest:
- The method documentation for qx.io.request.AbstractRequest#_getParsedResponse contains a broken link to qx.io.request._onReadyStateChange - The event documentation for qx.io.request.Xhr#readyStateChange contains a broken link to qx.bom.request.Xhr#readyState - The method documentation for qx.io.request.Jsonp#_getParsedResponse contains a broken link to qx.bom.request.Jsonp#responseJson - The class documentation for qx.data.store.Json contains a broken link to qx.data.store.Json#setDeprecatedTransport

Fixed all qx.ui.mobile.* related issues.
@Daniel: One issue is still open:
- The method documentation for qx.ui.mobile.page.Page#_applyId contains a broken link to qx.ui.mobile.page.Page#id
This seems to be a bug in the api validator.

(In reply to comment #6) > Fixed all qx.ui.mobile.* related issues. > > @Daniel: One issue is still open: > > - The method documentation for qx.ui.mobile.page.Page#_applyId contains a > broken link to qx.ui.mobile.page.Page#id > > This seems to be a bug in the api validator.

(In reply to comment #6)

With 603bdf8 (master) and ed54b6d (branch_1_6_x).
